name: Roll With The Beat
description:
Dun dudun, dun dudun

Roll with the beat!

This game is about creating a rhythm box to help BeatBoy get to the goal!

Enjoy creating the easiest path or your own groovy rhythm while playing through its 6 levels!

Dun-dadadada-dun

(Two songs included:

Vitas ft. Nappy Roots - Roll with the Beat

Scratch Bandits Crew Ft. Gavlyn, Reverie & Blimes Brixton - Cali to France

All the rights belong to the song creators)

The rest of the music is mine! :D
